name: phtpcrel

stmt.origin: relmptopab(hs2, hs0, hs1, cphtpc, c0, ctop, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), co(cii, ccn, cv(hs2))), wne(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cphtpy, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)), emptycls)))
stmt.pretty: relmptopab(hs2, hs0, hs1, cphtpc, c0, ctop, ({ hs0, hs1 } ⊆(II[Cn]hs2)∧(hs0[(PHtpy ` hs2)]hs1)≠ ∅))

body.origin:
|- wrel(cfv(cphtpc, c0))
-| wceq(cphtpc, cmpt(hs2, ctop, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), co(cii, ccn, cv(hs2))), wne(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cphtpy, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)), emptycls)))))
-| diffsc(hs2, ctop)
body.pretty:
⊢ Rel((~ = ph ` c0))
⊣ ~ = ph =(hs2 ∈ Top ↦ { < hs0, hs1 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ⊆(II[Cn]hs2)∧(hs0[(PHtpy ` hs2)]hs1)≠ ∅)})
⊣ d(hs2, Top)

-| diffsc(hs2, ctop)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Rel((~ = ph ` c0))
⊣ ~ = ph =(hs2 ∈ Top ↦ { < hs0, hs1 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ⊆(II[Cn]hs2)∧(hs0[(PHtpy ` hs2)]hs1)≠ ∅)})
⊣ d(hs2, Top)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cphtpc, cmpt(hs2, ctop, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), co(cii, ccn, cv(hs2))), wne(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cphtpy, cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)), emptycls)))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffss(hs2, hs0)
-| diffss(hs2, hs1)
body.pretty:
⊢ ~ = ph =(hs2 ∈ Top ↦ { < hs0, hs1 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ⊆(II[Cn]hs2)∧(hs0[(PHtpy ` hs2)]hs1)≠ ∅)})
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs2, hs0)
⊣ d(hs2, hs1)
